name: reactor_core_diag.exe
description:
A diagnostic tool for engineering work on UR-X-66 nuclear reactors. Stock up the nuclear reactor by inserting fuel rods. Make sure the reactor doesn't get too hot, or a meltdown is imminent. Please be careful with the budget.

Made for the 72 hour 1bit graphics game jam. Can be slow in browser, download native version if it's an issue. Sound might or might not be broken - try firefox if so.

Mouse controls. Left click to interact.

If anyone wants a non-windows native, you can make it using TIC-80 and the .tic file. .tic file is the source code - contains all code and assets, including original chiptune music.
